feedback.question: What features would you like to see in a digital banking service?
results: As a business owner, I would like to see features that can help me manage my finances effectively. For example, an expense tracking tool that can help me categorize my transactions and generate reports to identify areas where I can save money. I would also like to have budgeting tools that allow me to set monthly limits and track my spending against those limits. Additionally, a savings goal feature would be helpful to create customized targets and track my progress over time. Finally, I would like to have alerts to prevent overdrafts and keep my finances on track.
